description:
One of the most trusted and senior members of http://anidb.net/ch11900 [Nijuu-Mensou]`s group. He is initially reluctant to allow http://anidb.net/ch11899 [Chiko] to participate in their activities because he feels that she is still a child and should be leading a more normal life. As a result, he dislikes how the other thieves train Chiko to fight and live like a thief, but comes to accept her and her abilities when she asks to take part in a mission.
Source: Wiki
name: Senchou
